name: MetalRoyale
description:
Made for the Extra Credits Game Jam #4 (Theme: "Connect").

You assume the role of a rockstar, fighting your way to the stardom. Connect with your friends
and let the metal begin - but beware not to fall into the moshpit, as it can be deadly!

Comandos:

Project : https://github.com/jottap/Metal_Royale

#extragamejam
